abilities.name: Solemn Procession
abilities.rule: Each time you gain 1 Miracle dice at the start of the battle round, if this model is on the battlefield, do not roll one D6 to determine the value of that Miracle dice; it has a value of 6.

abilities.name: Relics of the Matriarchs
abilities.rule: At the start of the battle round, select up to two of the abilities in the Relics of the Matriarchs section. Until the start of the next battle round, this model has those abilities.
